title: r_config_dir — r_config_dir
code: library(configR)  # retrieve path to .Rprofile (i.e. ~/.config/R/.Rprofile) r_config_dir(".Rprofile") #> Warning: path[1]="/home/runner/.config/R": No such file or directory #> Warning: path[1]="/home/runner/.config/R/.Rprofile": No such file or directory #> [1] "/home/runner/.config/R/.Rprofile"  # retrieve path to your "profile" configuration directory # (i.e. ~/.config/R/profile) r_config_dir("profile") #> Warning: path[1]="/home/runner/.config/R": No such file or directory #> Warning: path[1]="/home/runner/.config/R/profile": No such file or directory #> [1] "/home/runner/.config/R/profile"

title: rver — rver
text: Helper function return system's installed R version variety commonly used formats. See format parameter available options.

title: rver — rver
text: format Character string one following: full, text, lib, major, minor, nickname. See details specifics.

title: rver — rver
text: character string specified format

title: rver — rver
text: following formatted return values can specified format argument: full: returns full {major}.{minor}.{patch} semantic version R. text: returns version string R format "R version {major}.{minor}.{patch} ({date} {crt})". lib: returns {major}.{minor} R version string; useful .libPaths(). major: returns major R version. minor: returns minor R version. nickname: returns R version's nickname (.e. value listed startup).

title: rver — rver
code: library(configR)  # get full R version rver() #> [1] "4.2.0"  # get path the default library path r_config_dir("lib", rver("lib")) #> Warning: path[1]="/home/runner/.config/R": No such file or directory #> Warning: path[1]="/home/runner/.config/R/lib/4.2": No such file or directory #> [1] "/home/runner/.config/R/lib/4.2"  # get full text string of R version details rver("text") #> [1] "R version 4.2.0 (2022-04-22)"
